DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether antibiotic give immediately birth alter development develop preterm infant 's microbiome , may alter overall clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Antibiotic Stewardship Protection Developing Preterm Infant Microbiome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria antibiotic randomization : 1 . Infant must bear gestational age 28 0/7 week 34 6/7 week AND 2 . Infant must bear investigator 's home institution . AND 3 . Infant must consider low risk infection one follow criterion : 1 . Delivered maternal indication ( Cesarean section induction labor maternal health , include preeclampsia , placental abruption , history intrauterine fetal demise ( IUFD ) /abruption , multiple gestation require preterm delivery , etc ) OR 2 . Delivered due preterm labor mother without diagnosis chorioamnionitis/maternal fever prolong rupture membrane > 18 hour Exclusion Criteria antibiotic randomization : 1 . Signs clinical illness within first 3 hour life : 1 . 5minute Apgar < 5 2 . Requiring vasoactive drug 3 . Seizures 4 . Significant respiratory distress require supplemental oxygen > 40 % 2 . Immature : Total ( I : T ) Ratio > 0.2 initial complete blood count ( CBC ) 3 . Congenital anomaly , include renal anomaly require serum antibiotic level monitoring ANY infant bear gestational age 28 0/7 week 34 6/7 week meet inclusion criterion , parental consent , participate stool analysis arm study .
